title: Trax Women's TR1740-BB Malibu Fun Black Rubber Black Dial Crystal Watch
features: Cushion shaped case studded with clear crystals
Easy read large dial with silver-tone Arabic numerals
Water resistant to 99 feet (30 M): withstands rain and splashes of water, but not showering or submersion
description: The charming Crystal Watch from Trax is sure to become an instant favorite the moment you slip it on your wrist. The red rubber strap is both comfortable and flexible, while the large silver-tone Arabic numerals are easy to read. Dozens of crystals are embedded in the cushion-shaped case, giving the watch its special sparkly style. The unique timepiece is also durable, with a stainless steel caseback and water resistance to 99 feet (50 meters).
